verses.verse: And thou shalt make<WH6213> an altar<WH4196> to burn<WH4729> incense<WH7004> upon: of shittim<WH7848> wood<WH6086> shalt thou make<WH6213> it.

A cubit<WH520> shall be the length<WH753> thereof, and a cubit<WH520> the breadth<WH7341> thereof; foursquare<WH7251> shall it be: and two cubits<WH520> shall be the height<WH6967> thereof: the horns<WH7161> thereof shall be of the same.

And thou shalt overlay<WH6823> it with pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>, the top<WH1406> thereof, and the sides<WH7023> thereof round about<WH5439>, and the horns<WH7161> thereof; and thou shalt make<WH6213> unto it a crown<WH2213> of gold<WH2091> round about<WH5439>. top: Heb. roof sides: Heb. walls

And two<WH8147> golden<WH2091> rings<WH2885> shalt thou make<WH6213> to it under the crown<WH2213> of it, by the two<WH8147> corners<WH6763> thereof, upon the two<WH8147> sides<WH6654> of it shalt thou make<WH6213> it; and they shall be for places<WH1004> for the staves<WH905> to bear<WH5375> it withal<WH1992>. corners: Heb. ribs
And thou shalt make<WH6213> the staves<WH905> of shittim<WH7848> wood<WH6086>, and overlay<WH6823> them with gold<WH2091>.

And thou shalt put<WH5414> it before<WH6440> the vail<WH6532> that is by the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715>, before<WH6440> the mercy seat<WH3727> that is over the testimony<WH5715>, where I will meet<WH3259> with thee.

And Aaron<WH175> shall burn<WH6999> thereon sweet<WH5561> incense<WH7004> every morning<WH1242>: when he dresseth<WH3190> the lamps<WH5216>, he shall burn incense<WH6999> upon it. sweet incense: Heb. incense of spices

And when Aaron<WH175> lighteth<WH5927> the lamps<WH5216> at even<WH6153>, he shall burn incense<WH6999> upon it, a perpetual<WH8548> incense<WH7004> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> throughout your generations<WH1755>. lighteth: or setteth up: Heb. causeth to ascend at even: Heb. between the two evenings
Ye shall offer<WH5927> no strange<WH2114> incense<WH7004> thereon, nor burnt sacrifice<WH5930>, nor meat offering<WH4503>; neither shall ye pour<WH5258> drink offering<WH5262> thereon.

And Aaron<WH175> shall make an atonement<WH3722> upon the horns<WH7161> of it once<WH259> in a year<WH8141> with the blood<WH1818> of the sin offering<WH2403> of atonements<WH3725>: once<WH259> in the year<WH8141> shall he make atonement<WH3722> upon it throughout your generations<WH1755>: it is most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> unto the LORD<WH3068>.
And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

When thou takest<WH5375> the sum<WH7218> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> after their number<WH6485>, then shall they give<WH5414> every man<WH376> a ransom<WH3724> for his soul<WH5315> unto the LORD<WH3068>, when thou numberest<WH6485> them; that there be no plague<WH5063> among them, when thou numberest<WH6485> them. their number: Heb. them that are to be numbered

This they shall give<WH5414>, every one that passeth<WH5674> among<WH5921> them that are numbered<WH6485>, half<WH4276> a shekel<WH8255> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary<WH6944>: (a shekel<WH8255> is twenty<WH6242> gerahs<WH1626>:) an half<WH4276> shekel<WH8255> shall be the offering<WH8641> of the LORD<WH3068>.
Every one that passeth<WH5674> among them that are numbered<WH6485>, from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and above<WH4605>, shall give<WH5414> an offering<WH8641> unto the LORD<WH3068>.

The rich<WH6223> shall not give more<WH7235>, and the poor<WH1800> shall not give less<WH4591> than half<WH4276> a shekel<WH8255>, when they give<WH5414> an offering<WH8641> unto the LORD<WH3068>, to make an atonement<WH3722> for your souls<WH5315>. give more: Heb. multiply give less: Heb. diminish

And thou shalt take<WH3947> the atonement<WH3725> money<WH3701> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and shalt appoint<WH5414> it for the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>; that it may be a memorial<WH2146> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>, to make an atonement<WH3722> for your souls<WH5315>.
And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Thou shalt also make<WH6213> a laver<WH3595> of brass<WH5178>, and his foot<WH3653> also of brass<WH5178>, to wash<WH7364> withal: and thou shalt put<WH5414> it between the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> and the altar<WH4196>, and thou shalt put<WH5414> water<WH4325> therein.
For Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall wash<WH7364> their hands<WH3027> and their feet<WH7272> thereat:

When they go<WH935> into the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>, they shall wash<WH7364> with water<WH4325>, that they die<WH4191> not; or when they come near<WH5066> to the altar<WH4196> to minister<WH8334>, to burn offering<WH6999> made by fire<WH801> unto the LORD<WH3068>:

So they shall wash<WH7364> their hands<WH3027> and their feet<WH7272>, that they die<WH4191> not: and it shall be a statute<WH2706> for ever<WH5769> to them, even to him and to his seed<WH2233> throughout their generations<WH1755>.
Moreover the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Take<WH3947> thou also unto thee principal<WH7218> spices<WH1314>, of pure<WH1865> myrrh<WH4753> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> shekels, and of sweet<WH1314> cinnamon<WH7076> half<WH4276> so much<WH4276>, even two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> shekels, and of sweet<WH1314> calamus<WH7070> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> shekels,
And of cassia<WH6916> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> shekels, after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary<WH6944>, and of oil<WH8081> olive<WH2132> an hin<WH1969>:

And thou shalt make<WH6213> it an oil<WH8081> of holy<WH6944> ointment<WH4888>, an ointment<WH7545> compound<WH4842> after the art<WH4639> of the apothecary<WH7543>: it shall be an holy<WH6944> anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081>. apothecary: or, perfumer
And thou shalt anoint<WH4886> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> therewith, and the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715>,
And the table<WH7979> and all his vessels<WH3627>, and the candlestick<WH4501> and his vessels<WH3627>, and the altar<WH4196> of incense<WH7004>,
And the altar<WH4196> of burnt offering<WH5930> with all his vessels<WH3627>, and the laver<WH3595> and his foot<WH3653>.
And thou shalt sanctify<WH6942> them, that they may be most<WH6944> holy<WH6944>: whatsoever toucheth<WH5060> them shall be holy<WH6942>.
And thou shalt anoint<WH4886> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121>, and consecrate<WH6942> them, that they may minister unto me in the priest's office<WH3547>.
And thou shalt speak<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, This shall be an holy<WH6944> anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081> unto me throughout your generations<WH1755>.

Upon man's<WH120> flesh<WH1320> shall it not be poured<WH3251>, neither shall ye make<WH6213> any other like it, after the composition<WH4971> of it: it is holy<WH6944>, and it shall be holy<WH6944> unto you.
Whosoever<WH834> <WH376> compoundeth<WH7543> any like it, or whosoever putteth<WH5414> any of it upon a stranger<WH2114>, shall even be cut<WH3772> off from his people<WH5971>.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Take<WH3947> unto thee sweet spices<WH5561>, stacte<WH5198>, and onycha<WH7827>, and galbanum<WH2464>; these sweet<WH5561> spices<WH5561> with pure<WH2134> frankincense<WH3828>: of each<WH905> shall there be a like<WH905> weight:
And thou shalt make<WH6213> it a perfume<WH7004>, a confection<WH7545> after the art<WH4639> of the apothecary<WH7543>, tempered<WH4414> together, pure<WH2889> and holy<WH6944>: tempered: Heb. salted

And thou shalt beat<WH7833> some of it very small<WH1854>, and put<WH5414> of it before<WH6440> the testimony<WH5715> in the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>, where I will meet<WH3259> with thee: it shall be unto you most<WH6944> holy<WH6944>.

And as for the perfume<WH7004> which thou shalt make<WH6213>, ye shall not make<WH6213> to yourselves according to the composition<WH4971> thereof: it shall be unto thee holy<WH6944> for the LORD<WH3068>.
Whosoever<WH834> <WH376> shall make<WH6213> like unto that, to smell<WH7306> thereto, shall even be cut off<WH3772> from his people<WH5971>.
